snippet: Nadal was knocked out of the China Open in Beijing in his third match since an injury layoff, falling to a big-hitting qualifier, Martin Klizan of Slovakia, 6-7 (7), 6-4, 6-3.
abstract: Qualifier Martin Klizan defeats Rafael Nadal in the quarterfinals of the China Open in Beijing; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Nadal was knocked out of the China Open in Beijing in his third match since an injury layoff, falling to a big-hitting qualifier, Martin Klizan of Slovakia, 6-7 (7), 6-4, 6-3.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Loses to Qualifier in China
